text: A licensed veterinarian is authorized to issue animal licenses and to collect the required fees and may collect an additional $2 for each license issued as reimbursement for administrative costs.

title.text: District of Columbia Boards and Commissions. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Issuance of animal license; collection of fees.
